lead_paragraph: LUCKENS--Helen (Shapiro), 98, of Weston, MA, formerly of Waltham, MA on Monday, June 27, 2016. Beloved wife of the late Rabbi Dr. Reuben Luckens. Devoted mother of Linda and her husband Fred Gelber and Rabbi Michael Luckens and his wife Sharon Schumack. Dear grandmother of Joshua Luckens. Dear sister of the late Carol Andiman. Burial was in Queens, New York. May her soul rest in peace and her memory be a blessing. 1/3
